__e: Can you please let me through?
I'll be very pleased to meet each of you. If you'd be kind enough to join me for tea in the garden.
My people are very welcoming and they're eager to meet you.
It's beautiful and blue, and the people around it are brown and kind and they did know how to laugh and sing.
And since it is 2003, I don't know who you are, so please exit the premises before I call the police on my stylish new flip phone.
You and the king were very kind to me.
My mother always told me to be kind to strangers. Strangers will be kind to you.
I trust you will treat him with the same courtesy as you have shown me.
